net.cnri.apps.doserver

Class ServerClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • java.security.SecureClassLoader
        • java.net.URLClassLoader
          • net.cnri.apps.doserver.ServerClassLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class ServerClassLoader
extends java.net.URLClassLoader
    Classloader which looks for classes and resources first in the server directory (and its classes and lib subdirectories). Potentially allows to override server functionality. Could be used to add custom storage or indexing capabilities.
